title: Runeterra Tectonic Plates Concept - Based on Killaburn Map
body: I'm not sure how to shout out people, but Killaburn please take a look. I can provide you more information on the Effects on the plates and their current movement, and how they formed the current topographical features of your Runeterra.

BTW, i like what you did to the targoninan plate. It is in between two plates and its like colliding with it forming a great mountain like india as to asia which formed the himalaayas :D nice job.

This is really cool. I like all the mountains on the Targonian Plate - it gives some rationale for why the middle part, south of the Vestigial Plate, would be a giant desert. 

A recommendation: drop the Vestigial Plate. Rather, have a mid-ocean ridge run down the middle of that sea. That ridge would then be the dividing line between the two plates. Long ago, the Targonian and Valoran plates would have been connected, but they split apart, forming that ocean. For comparison, see the Red Sea or Atlantic Ocean on Earth. Now, I imagine the Rune Wars or some other magic-related catastrophe might have accelerated that process, which would have been really traumatic for the people living on that side of Runeterra. 

Have you looked at wind patterns or ocean currents yet?
I thought that map was outdated?
